2008/5/5 fdmanana <fdmanana@...>:
>
> Hi,
>
>  I am launching JUnit through Ant, and I get the following error:
>
>  [junit] X Error: BadDevice, invalid or uninitialized input device 171
>  [junit] Major opcode: 147
>  [junit] Minor opcode: 3
>  [junit] Resource id: 0x0
>  [junit] Failed to open device
>  [junit] X Error: BadDevice, invalid or uninitialized input device 171
>  [junit] Major opcode: 147
>  [junit] Minor opcode: 3
>  [junit] Resource id: 0x0
>  [junit] Failed to open device
>
>  Any idea how to fix it?
>  thanks
>

Hi,

We don't have enough information there to help. Here are some
suggestions that may help:

* Can you run it in an IDE?
* Can you run it via the CLI?
* What is your environment?
* Can you provide some code that demonstrates the problem?

Regards,

James
